name: Catasteroids
description:
Hello and Welcome!

Have fun with this asteroids game. But not a regular asteroids! The cooling system of your ship reactor is malfunctioning. If the reactor overheat... your ship go BOOM!!!

Every time you shoot or use the rockets, your reactor heats up... Be carefull...

Try to survive in the asteroid field with this extra problem. And don't forget the enemy ships...

Controls:

Left and Right Arrow = rotate the ship;

Up Arrow = Thrust;

Space = Shoot;

Enter = Pause game.

Sprites were made by kenney (https://kenney.nl/).

Music was made by Tallbeard Studios (https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle).
